translations: 胸针（brooch 的复数，等于 broach）

sentences.sentence: You can try on these brooches to see which one you like.
sentences.translation: 你可以试试这几个胸针来看看你喜欢哪件。

sentences.sentence: Most likely, many women there will be wearing brooches as well.
sentences.translation: 最有可能的，许多妇女将有穿胸针也。

sentences.sentence: If you do not wish to have a brooch in only one color, multi-gemstone brooches are also available.
sentences.translation: 如果您不希望有一个胸针只有一种颜色，多宝石胸针也可提供。
